page.title: 07Clubs
page.content: These are the clubs in Thurgoland Brownies,Scouts,Cubs,Cricket,youth. Brownies meet on Mondays and sometimes they work for badges they make things, go camping and play a few games. Cricket is on Friday nights where they practise and pick the sides for Saturday.Boys from age eleven onwards can play too and the men help the boys to practise. Scouts meet on fridays and they do the same things as Brownies. Youth meets on thursdays you play games like snooker,table tennis,darts and when we had it the Atari.They sell sweets and that sort of thing. Brownies,Scouts meet at the Youth Centre.
